comment:
* Information given to an {@link InputMethod} about a client connecting
 * to it.

variables.name: mConnection
variables.comment: * The connection back to the client.

variables.name: mConnectionToken
variables.comment: * A remotable token for the connection back to the client.

variables.name: mUid
variables.comment: * The UID where this binding came from.

variables.name: mPid
variables.comment: * The PID where this binding came from.

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: * Used to make this class parcelable.

methods.name: public InputConnection getConnection()
methods.comment: * Return the connection for interacting back with the application.

methods.name: public IBinder getConnectionToken()
public int getUid()
methods.comment: * Return the user id of the client associated with this binding.

methods.name: public int getPid()
methods.comment: * Return the process id where this binding came from.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
methods.comment:
* Used to package this object into a {@link Parcel}.
     * 
     * @param dest The {@link Parcel} to be written.
     * @param flags The flags used for parceling.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
